data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Registered Office Address

This is for your information & records.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Considering & Approving The Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter & Nine Months Ended 31St December 2025
data.news_body: Samhi Hotels Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 28/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results ("UFRs") of the Company for the quarter & nine months ended 31st December 2025 both on standalone & consolidated basis. The Trading Window for dealing in Companys shares has already been closed w.e.f. 01st January 2026 and shall remain closed upto the expiry of 02 (two) trading days after declaration of the said UFRs. The Company has already intimated the same to the Exchange(s) on 26th December 2025.

data.caption: Incorporation Of A Wholly Owned Subsidiary Of The Company
data.news_body: We would like to inform you that the Company has incorporated a wholly-owned subsidiary company namely SAMHI Skyline Private Limited. The Ministry of Corporate Affairs Government of India has issued the Certificate of Incorporation on 16th day of January 2026. The relevant details as prescribed under regulation 30 of the SEBI LODR Regulations read with SEBI Master Circular dated 11th November 2024 is enclosed for your information & records.

data.news_body: We are enclosing herewith for your information & records the Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter & six months ended 30th September 2025 duly approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today along with the Limited Review Report thereon issued by the Statutory Auditors.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Tuesday 28Th October 2025
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today has inter-alia: 1. Approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter & six months ended 30th September 2025. A copy of the Results along with the Limited Review Report thereon issued by the Statutory Auditors on the above UFRs are enclosed herewith; and 2. Considered and approved the restructuring of the entities within the group i.e. transfer of an operating hotel (Fairfield by Marriott Hyderabad) / business undertaking from Duet India Hotels (Hyderabad) Private Limited to Caspia Hotels Private Limited (both entities being wholly owned subsidiaries of the Company) through demerger via the Honble National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) approval route in compliance with the provisions of Section 230 of the Companies Act 2013 read with rules provided thereunder. Please take the same in your records.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: A copy of the Press Release is enclosed for your information and records in relation to the receipt of a formal confirmation from the Maharashtra Industrial Development Corporation ("MIDC") granting an extension to the development of a landmark dual-branded hotel project in Navi Mumbai under the Westin & Fairfield brands.

data.caption: Extension Of Development Period For Project Land Located In Navi Mumbai From Maharashtra Industrial Development Corporation ("MIDC")
data.news_body: The Companys step-down subsidiary Duet India Hotels (Navi Mumbai) Private Limited has received a confirmation dated 27th October 2025 from the Maharashtra Industrial Development Corporation ("MIDC") for extension of the development period for the project land situated in Navi Mumbai subject to compliance with the conditions specified in MIDCs letter. The Company now proposes to develop a dual-branded hotel under Westin and Fairfield by Marriott brands. Please take this information on your records.

Further details are enclosed in the disclosure for your information & records.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On Thursday 03Rd July 2025
data.news_body: The Board at its meeting held today i.e. Thursday 03rd July 2025 has approved: (i) to hold the 15th AGM of the Company on Monday 04th day of August 2025 for the financial year 2024-25; (ii) the appointment of M/s. Walker Chandiok & Co. LLP Chartered Accountants (Firm Registration No.: 001076N/ N500013) as Statutory Auditors of the Company for 05 (five) consecutive years subject to the approval by Shareholders at the ensuing AGM; and (iii) to appoint M/s. T. Sharad & Associates Company Secretaries (Firm Registration No.: UCN S2004DE845800 & Peer Review Certificate No. 1746/2022) as Secretarial Auditors of the Company for 05 (five) consecutive years subject to the approval by Shareholders at the ensuing AGM.  The necessary details as per regulation 30 of the SEBI LODR Regulations are enclosed as annexures for your records.

data.caption: Completion Of Investment By Reco Bellflower Private Limited An Affiliate Of GIC Pte. Ltd. In Two (2) Subsidiary(Ies) Of The Company
data.news_body: Further to our disclosure dated 24th April 2025 with regard to the transactions entered into by the Company with Reco Bellflower Private Limited an affiliate of GIC Pte. Ltd. ("Investor") has completed its investment in two (2) subsidiary(ies) of the Company. Please refer to the enclosed disclosure for relevant details.

data.caption: Intimation Of Earnings Call On Audited Financial Results For Quarter & FY Ended 31St March 2025

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Considering And Approving The Audited Financial Results For The Quarter & Financial Year Ended 31St March 2025
data.news_body: Samhi Hotels Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 29/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve the standalone & consolidated Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter & financial year ended 31st March 2025. The Trading Window for dealing in shares of the Company has already been closed w.e.f. 01st April 2025 & the same shall remain closed upto the expiry of 2 (two) trading days after the date of declaration of the said financial results. The intimation for closure of trading window to the Exchange(s) has already been made on 26th March 2025.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizer"s Report

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Outcome of EGM

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: The Company is investing the funds by way of subscribing to equity shares of Ascent Hotels Private limited wholly owned subsidiary of the Company on rights issue basis which has been approved by board of directors of the Company in its meeting held today i.e. 14th May 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held today i.e. 14th May 2025 has considered & approved investing the funds of the Company in one of its wholly-owned subsidiaries namely Ascent Hotels Private Limited by way of secondary acquisition of shares. The relevant details are provided in the disclosure for your information & records.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: CARE Ratings Limited has placed the ratings assigned to the bank facilities of the Company and its subsidiary(ies) on Rating Watch with Positive Implications following the recent announcement made by the Company on stock exchange(s) portal of proposed GIC transaction. Please take the same in your records as per details enclosed.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: Please take on record the rating actions for the mentioned instruments issued by the Rating Committee of ICRA for the Company and its subsidiary(ies) based on the announcement made by the Company of proposed transaction with GIC.

data.caption: Opening Of A New Hotel Under The Brand Name "Holiday Inn Express" In Kolkata
data.news_body: This is to inform that the under-development Holiday Inn Express in New Town Kolkata has been opened as on today i.e. 06th May 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated 8Th November, 2023
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of SAMHI Hotels Limited ('the Company') at its meeting held today, i.e. Wednesday, 8th November, 2023, (which commenced at 07:00 p.m. and concluded at 07:55 p.m.) has, inter-alia, transacted the following business:

1. Approved and taken on record the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) (''UFRs'') of the Company for the quarter ended and half year ended on 30th September, 2023, pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations); (enclosed herewith)

2. Taken on record the Limited Review Report of M/s. B S R & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants, (Statutory Auditors) on the above UFRs. (enclosed herewith)

data.caption: June-30-2023
data.news_body: Un-audited Financial results on Standalone and Consolidated basis for the quarter ended June 30, 2023

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 11 October 2023
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of SAMHI Hotels Limited ('the Company') at its meeting held today, i.e. 11th October, 2023, (which commenced at 06:45 p.m. and concluded at 07:50 p.m.) has, inter-alia, transacted the following business:

1. Approved and taken on record the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) (''UFRs'') of the Company for the quarter ended on 30th June, 2023, pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(j) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations); (enclosed herewith)

2. Taken on record the Limited Review Report of M/s. B S R & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants, (Statutory Auditors) on the above UFRs. (enclosed herewith)


This information is also being uploaded on the website of the Company i.e. https://www.samhi.co.in/
